name: agent-skills-marketplace
description: A curated collection of Claude Code skills and plugins for developers

plugins.name: daily-carry
plugins.description: Essential daily-use skills: Portainer deployment management and Tech Research Enforcer for verified coding answers

plugins.name: release-automation
plugins.description: Automated release workflow for any project type with version bumping, changelog generation, documentation sync, and git operations. Supports Node.js, Python, Rust, Go, Java, generic projects, monorepos, and Claude Code plugins.

plugins.name: session-workflow
plugins.description: Hobbyist-focused software engineering workflows: 46 commands, 5 research agents, complexity metrics (LOC) instead of time estimates, no org/team concepts, single developer perspective
